title: Best of The Herd for Jun 03, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Jun 03, 2020
description:
Vic Fangio's comments about racism in the NFL were tone deaf

The NBA will get crushed by the NFL in the Fall

Pro Football Focus doesn't rank Aaron Rodgers as a top 50 NFL player

The NBA needs LeBron more than ever with their makeshift playoff format

When will each rookie QB win their first NFL game


Guest: Rich Kleiman, Kevin Durant's Business Partner 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
